TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstrumentationClassAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: Specifies that a class provides event or instance instrumentation.

span.span: Specifies that a class provides event or instance instrumentation.

summary.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

summary.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

span.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationType instrumentationType) cil managed

param.name: instrumentationType
param.span: The type of instrumentation provided by this class.

span.span: The type of instrumentation provided by this class.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is used if this type is derived from another type that has the attribute, or if this is a top-level instrumentation class (for example, an instance or abstract class without a base class, or an event derived from **__ExtrinsicEvent**).

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is used if this type is derived from another type that has the attribute, or if this is a top-level instrumentation class (for example, an instance or abstract class without a base class, or an event derived from **__ExtrinsicEvent**).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## Безопасность платформы .NET Framework.NET Framework Security Полное доверие для непосредственно вызывающего метода.Full trust for the immediate caller. Этот член не может быть использован частично доверенным кодом.This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. Дополнительные сведения см. в разделе [с помощью библиотек из частично доверенного кода](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that has schema for an existing base class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that has schema for an existing base class.

summary.span: The class must contain proper member definitions for the properties of the existing WMI base class.

span.span: The class must contain proper member definitions for the properties of the existing WMI base class.

Этот член не может быть использован частично доверенным кодом.This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstrumentationType As InstrumentationType

summary.span: Gets or sets the type of instrumentation provided by this class.

span.span: Gets or sets the type of instrumentation provided by this class.

value.span: Возвращает значение перечисления, содержащий тип инструментария, предоставляемый данным классом.

span.span: Returns an enumeration value containing the type of instrumentation provided by this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## Значение свойстваProperty Value Содержит значение, указывающее, является ли это инструментированные события, экземпляр или абстрактный класс.Contains an value that indicates whether this is an instrumented event, instance, or abstract class. ## Безопасность платформы .NET Framework.NET Framework Security Полное доверие для непосредственно вызывающего метода.Full trust for the immediate caller. Этот член не может быть использован частично доверенным кодом.This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. Дополнительные сведения см. в разделе [с помощью библиотек из частично доверенного кода](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ManagedBaseClassName As String
public: property System::String ^ ManagedBaseClassName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the base class of this instrumentation class.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the base class of this instrumentation class.

value.span: Возвращает значение, содержащее имя базового класса для данного класса инструментария.

span.span: Returns a value containing the name of the base class of this instrumentation class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## Значение свойстваProperty Value В противном случае `null`, эта строка указывает базовый класс WMI, этот класс наследует от схемы CIM.If not `null`, this string indicates the WMI base class that this class inherits from in the CIM schema. ## Безопасность платформы .NET Framework.NET Framework Security Полное доверие для непосредственно вызывающего метода.Full trust for the immediate caller. Этот член не может быть использован частично доверенным кодом.This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. Дополнительные сведения см. в разделе [с помощью библиотек из частично доверенного кода](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
